int32_t getSpanStart (const ObjectStyle *what)
 Return the beginning of the range of text to which the specified markup object is attached, or -1 if the object is not attached.
int32_t getSpanEnd (const ObjectStyle *what)
 Return the end of the range of text to which the specified markup object is attached, or -1 if the object is not attached.
int32_t getSpanFlags (const ObjectStyle *what)
 Return the flags that were specified when Spannable#setSpan was used to attach the specified markup object, or 0 if the specified object has not been attached.
int32_t nextSpanTransition (int32_t start, int32_t limit)
 Return the first offset greater than or equal to start where a markup object of class type begins or ends, or limit if there are no starts or ends greater than or equal to start but less than limit.

Private Member Functions

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (SpannedString)

Detailed Description

This is the class for text whose content and markup are immutable.

For mutable markup, see SpannableString; for mutable text, see SpannableStringBuilder.

This is the class for text whose content and markup are immutable.

          int32_t gaia::text::SpannedString::nextSpanTransition

          start, 
        

        

          
          
          int32_t 
          limit 
        

        

          
          )
           [virtual]
        

      







Return the first offset greater than or equal to start where a markup object of class type begins or ends, or limit if there are no starts or ends greater than or equal to start but less than limit. 


Specify null or Object.class for the type if you want every transition regardless of type.
